articles.author: Tim Newman
articles.title: Live updates: Coronavirus COVID-19 - Medical News Today
articles.description: This live article covers developments regarding the coronavirus COVID-19. We will update it regularly as the situation unfolds.
articles.content:
This article provides regularly updated information on the COVID-19 outbreak, with links to useful resources.
The recent coronavirus outbreak began in Wuhan, China, in December 2019. Now known as SARS-CoV-2, the virus has infected tens of thousands of people… [+2062 chars]
